metadata.description: Flingin' feces, True Believer -- the entire Marvel Universe has gone APE! Just when he thinks life can't get any worse or weirder, Marty Blank -- a.k.a. that lovable loser, the Gibbon -- finds himself and the brilliant-and-beautiful Dr. Fiona Fitzhugh transported to a world where monkeys rule and humans don't exist!
metadata.name: Marvel Apes: Prime Eight
